An SD card with at least {SIZE} MB of free space is required to play the game.
The game requires additional data ({SIZE} MB) to run on your device. Do you want to launch the download now?
We recommend switching to a Wi-Fi connection, otherwise data charges may apply during the download according to your plan or data package.
To start downloading the game, please choose your connection. We recommend that you use a 3G network connection.

No Wi-Fi connection detected.\nDo you want to retry your Wi-Fi connection now or go through your carrier network?

No Wi-Fi connection detected. We will monitor the network and launch the download when a Wi-Fi connection is detected. You can also start the download anytime by selecting the game icon in your applications.
No Wi-Fi connection detected.\nDo you want to retry your Wi-Fi connection now or go through your 3G network?

Do you wish to download the remaining data through your 3G network?
Data charges may apply according to your data plan
No data connection detected.\nDo you want to activate your Wi-Fi connection?
You can start the download anytime through Wi-Fi or from your carrier network by selecting the game icon in your applications.
You can start the download anytime through Wi-Fi or from your 3G network by selecting the game icon in your applications.
Please do not turn off your device while the download is in progress.

Please activate your Internet connection in order to continue.

You are downloading using Wi-Fi.

The game has been successfully downloaded.\nSelect OK and start playing!

An update is necessary to continue. Choose OK to update your game. \nSelecting NO will cause your game to close until you have updated it.
